Reviews.Title: Nice, however its not awesome
Reviews.Author: Fezzz Chachoz
Reviews.Content: This phone is very sleek and great to talk withIts a smart phone... well hardly compared to today's phonesbut its an all-round good phonealthough the photos it takes suckVideo quality is comparable to the old razerzand Its not very waterproof...on that note its got-Great texting optionsIt's a phone and does everything a phone should doPlus its very smallits very durableits very stylishit feels like its a solid build that doesn't have any cheap plasticsplus the screen is brilliant!and last but not least it does take SIM cardsif you're just looking for a phone that gets the job done,There are none out there better

Reviews.Title: Ok not that expected
Reviews.Author: Prem
Reviews.Content: This phone keypad is not that friendly and scroll also not good.Overall not ok
